title: The hutment dweller shall be responsible to pay the electricity and other government charges regularly, and maintain his rehab unit and do necessary minor repairs as and when so required at his own cost
clause_text: The hutment dweller shall be responsible to pay the electricity and other government charges regularly, and maintain his rehab unit and do necessary minor repairs as and when so required at his own cost. However, for carrying out any major changes in the structure of the building in whatsoever nature, the permission of the C.E.O., S.R.A. in writing shall be required.
